snippet: By Wednesday evening, amid indications of a government intervention in the currency markets, the ruble had recovered more than 11 percent of its previous day’s losses.
abstract: Russian government introduces package of measures to reduce pressures on banks and urges public to stay calm in face of fears of economic meltdown; ruble recovers more than 11 percent of previous day's losses as result of intervention.
lead_paragraph: By Wednesday evening, amid indications of a government intervention in the currency markets, the ruble had recovered more than 11 percent of its previous day’s losses.

headline.main: Russia Introduces Measures to Calm Economic Jitters
headline.print_headline: Russia Introduces Measures to Calm Economic Jitters
